title: The Cinnamon Bun Mystery
description: Erica and her dad ride their bikes to the bakery on Saturday morning to get a hot cinnamon bun. When Erica asks the baker for her usual, she learns that a lady just bought all the cinnamon buns. Erica and her dad set out to discover who bought all the buns and why.
meta: art, baker, bakery, cinnamon bun, scooter, usual
Use the reading strategy of asking questions to understand text
Problem and Solution : Identify the problem and solution

Vowel Y : Understand that y may represent the long /e/ or /i/ sound
Present-Tense Verbs : Recognize and understand the present verb tense
Position Words : Recognize and understand preposition words
